Turf a Million

[Jämtland]

Round 2025-03

<< 2025-02 --- 2025-04 >>

Can you reach a score of a million points?

This is a list where you cannot get more than a million points. One third of the factor is determind by the amount of takes you have, one third of the factor is determind by the amount of round uniques you have and the last third of the factor is determind by the amount of travel distance you have this round.

Columns left to right: [Placement difference], [Place], [Turfplace], [Name], [Score], [% diff], [Turfscore] (Rotate screen for all data). Explanation and examples of score calculations.
